== Theme Modifications ==

The following assumes using *Kakumei*. You may need to make you own if you use different theme.

=== post.php and style.css ===
line 2 in `post.php`
{{{
<p><strong><?php post_author_link(); ?></strong><br />
  <small><?php post_author_title(); ?></small></p>
}}}
Add a line like
{{{
<p><strong><?php post_author_link(); ?></strong><br />
  <img style="border: 1px solid black" width="64px" height="64px" src="<?php GAImageURI(get_post_author_id()); ?>" alt="<?php post_author();?>"/>
  <small><?php post_author_title(); ?></small></p>
}}}

Add a new style to `style.css`
{{{
.threadpost {
    min-height: 100px;
    }
}}}

=== profile.php ===

You can add a bigger avatar in profile page. Insert the following code before `<?php bb_profile_data(); ?>`
{{{
<img class="right" style="border: 1px solid gold" width="80px" height="80px" src="<?php GAImageURI(0, 80); ?>" alt="<?php echo get_user_name();?>"/>
}}}

== Usage ==

=== GAGetImageURI($id, $size) ===

  * `$id` - User ID
  * `$size` - The size (px) of avatar. Default value is 64px. Currently, it is up to 80px.

=== GAImageURI($id, $size) ===

The `echo` version of `GAgetImageURI`
